Articles.Content:
* Running Remote Tech 2

- Sent a probe (scanner / commsat) to Duna POLAR ORBIT!!!!

- No Problems with power generating from the solar panels, or batt charging , played around, lots of maneuvers & plane changes.

- Came back several weeks later and there was only 1% battery when I loaded, and just enough juice to reorient the craft toward the Sun.

I have control, and communication, but it says the batteries are drained...

UPDATE:::: Ok, after I wrote this, I went back to my (minimized game) and NOW its generating power

Whats going on here?
